external_games.name: Nancy Drew: The Deadly Secret of Olde World Park
Nancy Drew: The Deadly Secret of Olde World Park

name: Nancy Drew: The Deadly Secret of Olde World Park
summary: Become Nancy Drew as she unravels the mystery of the missing billionaire in this engaging action adventure game for the Nintendo DS. Use Nancy's detective skills to solve puzzles and discover clues left by a slew of suspicious characters.
